text: Anatole Collinet Makosso (born 1965) is a Congolese politician. He was the Prime Minister of the Republic of the Congo since 2021.Congo seeks way out of economic crisis, interview with PM Anatole Collinet Makosso He was Minister of Primary and Secondary Education from 2015 to 2021, and as the Minister of Youth and Civic Instruction from 2011 to 2016. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of the Republic of the Congo
title: Anatole Collinet Makosso
